long_description: The Xshot Pocket telescoping camera extender lets you get into the picture with your friends when you don't have a timer or helpful bystander to take the picture for you. Eliminate awkward photos taken at arm's length or having to ask a stranger to take a picture for you; capture more background and scenery and take pictures from unique angles. Durable metal shaft extends to 30.5 in. and collapses down to 6.5 in. for easy carry. Camera adapter connects to tripod mount on your camera, rotates 180deg and features a quick-spin knob for easy camera mounting; thumb screw locks camera in desired position. The Xshot Pocket telescoping camera extender comes with a handy neck lanyard.
short_description: The Xshot Pocket telescoping camera extender lets you get into the picture with your friends when you don't have a timer or helpful bystander to take the picture for you.
